trans-unit.source: Enables <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.
trans-unit.target: Abilita <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli o altri controlli server per contenere raccolte di verbi.

trans-unit.source: A verb in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Un verbo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli è un'azione che un utente può eseguire nell'interfaccia utente (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item.
trans-unit.target: In genere, un verbo è rappresentato nell'interfaccia utente da un controllo selezionabile tramite clic, ad esempio un pulsante, un collegamento o una voce di menu.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part fornisce verbi standard disponibili per impostazione predefinita per <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli e altri controlli server (ad esempio personalizzato, ASP.NET e l'utente controlla) che possono fungere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Controlla quando viene inserita <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export.
trans-unit.target: I verbi standard includono chiudere, ridurre al minimo, ripristinano, eliminare, modificano ed esportano.

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom verbs for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile creare verbi personalizzati per l'utilizzo con <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>e i controlli server.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The IWebActionable interface, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls.
trans-unit.target: L'interfaccia IWebActionable, con il relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>proprietà consente di integrare i controlli di verbi personalizzati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements the IWebActionable interface and implements its single property.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe implementa l'interfaccia IWebActionable e implementa la singola proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere verbi personalizzati a un controllo che eredita dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(classe), è necessario eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>aggiungere verbi personalizzati a una raccolta di proprietà e restituire la raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà contiene solo i verbi personalizzati; verbi standard non sono inclusi in questa raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore di restituire il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo `null`, poiché per impostazione predefinita non sono verbi personalizzati nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls requires one extra step.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunta di verbi personalizzati per i controlli server che non sono <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli richiede un passaggio aggiuntivo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In those cases, the controls must also implement the IWebActionable interface and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In questi casi, i controlli devono inoltre implementare l'interfaccia IWebActionable e implementare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have added custom verbs to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver aggiunto i verbi personalizzati per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>, raccolta di controlli Web part impostato automaticamente gestisce i passaggi necessari per creare ed eseguire il rendering dei verbi personalizzati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento a una raccolta di personalizzato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà Verbs fa riferimento a una raccolta di verbi personalizzati (se presente) che vengono aggiunti a un menu dei verbi nell'intestazione di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o un altro controllo server.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Verbs collection does not contain references to the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di verbi non contiene riferimenti allo standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>impostare gli oggetti forniti con il controllo di Web part, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can simply override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori che desiderano aggiungere verbi personalizzati per un oggetto personalizzato di controllo che deriva dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe semplicemente è possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>proprietà che la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>implementazione della classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface by providing an implementation of the Verbs property.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori che desiderano aggiungere verbi personalizzati a un controllo utente o un controllo personalizzato che non è un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>di controllo, deve implementare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>interfaccia fornendo un'implementazione di proprietà Verbs.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref> contenente personalizzato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> oggetti.
